subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins fired the assistant coaches Gregg Williams and Al Saunders on Saturday, promoted Greg Blache to lead the team’s defense and announced that a head coach would most likely not be in place for at least another week. The Redskins also announced the hiring of Jim Zorn, who agreed to a three-year deal Friday to lead the offense.
